--- id: ls02 cost: $10.00 paypal_id: TS6SR2VGK2TS6 product_name: Landsknecht Pikeniere (Pikemen) rss: https://picasaweb.google.com/data/feed/base/user/112010499415177474102/albumid/6065637986723208737?alt=rss&kind=photo&authkey=Gv1sRgCLGY84KW1uifmwE&hl=en_US local_nav_weight: 120 short_title: Pikeniere (Pikemen) title: 10mm Landsknecht Pikeniere (Pikemen) ---

All Landsknechte in a regiment were trained in the use of the pike, fighting in pike square formations developed by the Swiss in the early 15th century.

This is a Pikeniere (Pikemen) unit of fifteen strips of two figures each (30 figures total). You will recieve one standard bearer/musician strip (ls02a), eight line strips (a mix of ls02b–e) and six column strips (a mix of ls02f–h). Bases are not included.

Sculpted by Bob Naismith and cast by D & D Model Cleaning & Casting in lead free pewter.
